How to Install tabble on debian

  • Home
  • debian
  • tabble

Today in this tutorial, I’ll show you how you can install tabble on debian with and without using the command line.

Introduction

Installing tabble on debian is very easy. And with the help of this tutorial, you will be able to easily install, update and uninstall tabble in just a few steps.

In this tutorial I’ll show you four methods to install tabble, the methods are using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic. All these methods require you to have an active and stable internet connection and sudo permission.

Install tabble Using apt

To install tabble in debian using apt, you will need to run the apt update command first to get the updated list of packages from the repositories.

Copy the command given below and paste it in the command line, then press enter. If you are using the sudo command for the first time then you might also need to enter your root password.

sudo apt update

After you have updated the package list using apt, you can now install tabble using the apt install command. To do that use the command given below.

sudo apt -y install tabble

The installation of tabble might take a little bit of time depending upon your internet connection and machine configuration.

Install tabble Using apt-get

To install tabble using apt-get in debian, you will need to first update the package list using the apt-get update command. Copy, paste, and enter the command given below in the command line.

sudo apt-get update

After updating the package lists, use the apt-get install command given below to install tabble.

sudo apt-get -y install tabble

Install tabble Using Synaptic

To install tabble using Synaptic you will need to first install Synaptic, you can do that by following the instructions from here. After installing synaptic follow the steps below to install tabble on your debian using Synaptic.

You can open synaptic by clicking on the menu icon then searching for synaptic or you can open the command line and enter the command given below –

sudo synaptic

After synaptic opens, click on the search icon and search for tabble. This will display the tabble package in the package window, now to install tabble, click on the checkbox that is on the left side.

Then click on Mark for Installation, this will select the tabble package for installation, now to install it click on the Apply button, you will get a summary window where click on the apply button again to start the download of tabble.

If the download and installation are successful then the checkmark option will turn green.

Install tabble Using aptitude

To install tabble on debian using aptitude, you will need to first install Aptitude in your debian. To install Aptitude follow the instructions here. Once you have aptitude installed proceed to the installation of tabble.

Now you will need to first update your package lists from the repositories, use the apt update command for that, after that update the package list of aptitude using the aptitude update command.

sudo apt update sudo aptitude update

After updating the package list of aptitude, install tabble using the command aptitude install tabble.

sudo aptitude -y install tabble

How to Upgrade tabble on debian

If you want to upgrade the tabble package on your debian to its latest version then here’s how you can do that using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic.

Upgrade tabble using Apt & Apt-get

To upgrade tabble to its latest version using apt or apt-get, you will need to open the terminal then run the sudo apt update command to update the package list, after that copy and paste the commands given below to upgrade tabble.

sudo apt install --only-upgrade tabble sudo apt-get install --only-upgrade tabble

Upgrade tabble using Aptitude

To upgrade tabble using aptitude you will need to again run the update command to update the package list, use command sudo aptitude update to do that. After that run the command given below to upgrade tabble.

sudo aptitude -y full-upgrade tabble

Upgrade tabble using Synaptic

To upgrade tabble using synaptic open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or by going to the menu and searching for synaptic.

In synaptic click on the reload button, this will look for updates. After that you will need to search for tabble, now right-click tabble, and click on the mark for upgrade option.

Now to upgrade tabble just click on the apply button, then click on the apply button again in the summary screen.

How To Uninstall tabble on debian

If you want to remove and uninstall tabble from your debian then here’s how you can do that. To remove just tabble, you can use the command that is given below, copy the command, paste it in the command line then press enter.

sudo apt remove tabble

Remove related packages, dependencies & configuration files of tabble

To remove all the related packages, dependencies and configuration files of tabble you can use the command given below.

sudo apt -y purge tabble

Remove tabble using Synaptic Package Manager

You can also uninstall tabble using the synaptic package manager, first open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or search and open it directly.

After that in synaptic search for tabble, right-click the tabble package and click on the Mark for Complete Removal option. Now to uninstall tabble click on the apply button then in summary click on apply again.

Conclusion

That is how you can install tabble on debian using the command line or using the synaptic package manager. I also showed you how you can uninstall and upgrade tabble using the command line or using the synaptic package manager.

If you need any help regarding the installation of tabble then send me a mail at netmikoblog@gmail.com, thank you.
